headline: Pharmaceutical Packaging Market Trends and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Amcor, 3M, Schott, WestRock, Berry Global, McKesson, AptarGroup, Klockner Pentaplast, CCL, FlexiTuff
summary: The pharmaceutical packaging market is projected to surge from USD 142.5 billion in 2024 to USD 299.42 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 8.60%. Key growth factors include rising global drug demand, aging populations, chronic disease prevalence, advancements in drug delivery systems, regulatory compliance, and expansion in emerging markets. Innovations in environmentally friendly packaging and biologics usage also propel growth. Segments include materials like plastics, paper, glass, and produ
